mapper.sql: id, name, is_have_sect, sect_name, round_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
update demo_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_have_sect = #{haveSectFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
sect_name = #{sectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
round_count = #{roundCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update demo_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_have_sect = #{haveSectFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, sect_name = #{sectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, round_count = #{roundCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
